name: OrdiZK
description: Anonymously Connecting ETH and BTC to keep you secure. Unleash the power of privacy in decentralized transactions with our revolutionary bridge technology. OrdiZK seamlessly connects Ethereum networks and BRC20 while ensuring complete anonymity through cutting-edge zero-knowledge proofs. $OZK is the native token of OrdiZK and your ticket to privacy within the explosive BRC20 ecosystem. Whether you're a seasoned veteran or just a beginner, OrdiZK can benefit your trading and/or exploration within the ecosystem in more ways than one: Anonymous Bridge - Two-way privacy bridge (initially ERC 20 >< BRC20) Inscriptions/Ordinals bot - Inscribe NFT's, tokens and more on BRC20 BRC20 wallet - OrdiZK utilities built into the wallet
